timeline.message:
Expect:100-Continue header handling

Signed-off-by: Maxim Nesen <maxim.nesen@oracle.com>

timeline.author: jansupol

replies.bodyText: for now this is being investigated because ClientRequest#resolveProperty does not resolve those properties which are put to clientConfiguration by the feature
replies.author: senivam

timeline.bodyText: Could you please use the builder pattern?
timeline.author: jansupol

timeline.bodyText: Allows for HTTP Expect:100-Continue being handled by the HttpUrlConnector
timeline.author: jansupol
